fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
eu_initiatives: Legal basis for implementation of advisory system is article 15 of Regulation (EU) No 1305/2013 on support for RD by the European Agricultural Fund for Rural Development (EAFRD), Implementation of Measure M01: Knowledge transfer and information actions and Measure M02: Advisory Service, service for management of farms and help for farms and professional assitance in other RDP 2014-2020 measures, Implementation of the system of agricultural accountancy data by annual surveys (FADN)
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
membership:
GFRAS (Global Forum for Rural Advisory Service) member (www.g-fras.org) 
EUFRAS (European Forum for Rural Advisory Services)member (www.eufras.eu) 
IALB (International Academy for Rural Advisory Service) member (www.ialb.org) 
SEASN (South-eastern Europe Advisory Service Network) founder and member (www.seasn.eu)
goals__remit:
The development of competitive and advanced farms and entities in fisheries using information, advisory and education, while following the principle of good agricultural practice, and the preservation of rural areas, fostering tradition and customs. 
Goals: 
Increased competitiveness of farms  
More effective use of national and EU funds  
Conducting annual FADN surveys  
Expert supervision of integrated production  
Professional education and training of farms and entities in fisheries.
relevant_communication:
Horizon 2020 projects: 
PLAID (Peer-to-peer Learning: Accessing Innovation through Demonstration), NEFERTITI (Networking European Farms to Enhance cRoss ferTilisation and Innovation uptake Through demonstration), 
Erasmus+ project: E-COFARM (Eco-friendly Farming for Future)
position: Head of Department for International Cooperation
